docna.cdata!:
Benin - Second Education Project : Credit
            1246 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Benin - Second Education Project
            : Credit 1246 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The main objective of the proposed
            project is to assist the Government in improving the quality
            of primary and lower secondary education. The proposed
            project would comprise: (a) construction, equipment, and
            staff training for three integrated teacher colleges for
            primary and lower secondary teacher education with a total
            enrollment of about 1,190 students; (b) construction,
            equipment, and staff training for a textbook production and
            distribution program with an average annual output over the
            project implementation period of 470,000 books; and (c)
            staff training, equipment and operating costs for project
            management and evaluation, and specialist services for
            identification and preparation of future education projects.

abstracts.cdata!:
The main objective of the Second
            Education Project for Benin is to assist the Government in
            improving the quality of primary and lower secondary
            education. The project will comprise: (a) construction,
            equipment, and staff training for three integrated teacher
            colleges for primary and lower secondary teacher education
            with a total enrollment of about 1,190 students; (b)
            construction, equipment, and staff training for a textbook
            production and distribution program with an average annual
            output over the project implementation period of 470,000
            books; and (c) staff training, equipment and operating costs
            for project management and evaluation, and specialist
            services for identification and preparation of future
            education projects.
